titleStmt.title: Hæc homo wherein the excellency of the creation of woman is described, by way of an essay. By William Austin Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Austin, William, 1587-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Olton for Ralph Mabb, and are to be sold by Charles Greene,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, bearing the imprint: London printed. for R: Mabb. 1637.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
